caption.title: Reporting triangle for ILI on June 8, 2015.
caption.p: The TxD reporting triangle decomposes the number of cases, n t,d, reported for each week t (rows) and each delay d (column), up to a delay of D = 26 weeks within the 27-week moving window. The goal of nowcasting is to predict the missing (NA) n t,dâ€™s.
Click here for additional data file.
